title: 2 Bedroom With A Den Ready Now!! Come Look While You Have The Chance!!
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom + 1 Den, 1 Bath, approximately 958 Sq.
Located on Mercer Island just outside of Seattle, Washington you’ll find comfort and convenience in this luxury apartment community.
Shorewood offers restored, spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes that feature hardwood floors, crown molding, washer and dryer in every home and fully equipped kitchens.
Residents can also enjoy our community room, 24-hour fitness center, tennis courts and basketball courts.
Mercer Island schools nearby and easy access to I-90 puts you in a great location where residents enjoy numerous shopping and dining venues nearby and around Seattle.
Lease today to experience luxury living at its best.
- Spacious kitchens with charming garden windows
- Shaker-style white or soft grey cabinetry*
- Renovated clubhouse with flat-screen TVs, lounge, and Wi-Fi
We are a pet friendly community!
We welcome both cats and dogs, with a maximum of two pets per household.

For dogs, we do also have breed restrictions of Pit Bull Terriers/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, Doberman Pinschers, Chows, Presa Canarios, Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, and Wolf-Hybrids, and a maximum weight limit of 75lbs.
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
